EmailTemplate.textOnly:
110 Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Wayne,
I just left a voicemail on your phone, please see my direct contact information below. In addition I have an appointment scheduled for us to chat tomorrow morning at 10:00EST. I look forward to speaking with you then.
Regards,
Steve
___________________________________ Steve Arhancet Director, Enrollments and Market Development MBO Partners
t: 703.793.6011 f: 703.793.6081 m: 540.560.8837 e: sarhancet@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com
Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files.
From: Kelly Scherer Sent: Thursday, August 11, 2011 2:56 PM To: popewm@sdpsquared.net Cc: Steve Arhancet Subject: MBO Partners
Hi Wayne
Thank you for your call today! As discussed, I have enabled a re-enrollment for you, so if you login to www.mbopartners.com, you will be able to click on “enrollment forms,” and complete the process – also, given that it has been a few years since you have been with us, you will need a new I-9 form.
I am copying Steve Arhancet on this email, as he manages the enrollment team, so please feel free to reach out to him with your client’s contact details – he’ll be more than happy to get the ball rolling for you
Thanks and all the best
___________________________________ Kelly Scherer Director, Executive Services Group MBO Partners
t: 703.793.6025 f: 703.793.6085 e: kscherer@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com
